g.text: What can we do to enhance data security within
Make the development process that is efficiency
How to make the development process to be more
Require ongoing security training for the development
team, and require that all newly developed APIs,
instrument the required security tests in their
Restricted user to only necessary area : Practice
Secure and protect data from leaks : Design Solution
How to secure the data of the company? : Decision
Personal or sensitive data has to be protected
Adopt data governance, educate on data practices,
Implement automated security testing, avoid access
to repositories, and apply the principle of least
